content: learn create and be inspired by here @dotpebbles_knits please also remember that this pattern like all of my patterns is copyrighted this prohibits copying or reproducing any of its writing content for your own profit however if you want to sell what you ve made from any of my patterns then that is perfectly fine - i actually encourage it and have an instagram account @imadethisrabbit_shop to promote you reach out with #imadethisrabbit_shop and please do share what you ve created from this pattern #dotpebbles_knits #dotpebblescreatureland #imadethisrooroo kits for these and other dot pebbles knits pattern are available here knitted home x discover more patterns here @dotpebbles_knits
